name: The Shape Shifters - 'Soul-Lows' 1 or 2 / 'Greatest Hits' CDr / 'Gangstahz Fo Gawd' CD (Awol One, 2M
description:
****** SELECT FROM THE DROP DOWN MENU!! ******
Shape Shifters - Greatest Hits Vol. 1 (ONLY ONE LEFT!!!)
*Official Shifters release CDr* Price: $11.50 (FRESH DEAL!!!) Super dope collection of Shifters cuts from just about every release on vinyl or CD! + some unreleased & rarities, like this rare version of Brainfish - 'Brainfish Oner' & alternate version of 'Pot Of Gold'. Features tracks from some of the great Shifters albums like, Know Future, Adopted by Aliens, Circus & Friends- Gangstahz Fo Gawd & more! Just plain dope, whether you've been a fan for a decade or a month. This is a definite must cop! Tight underground hip hop! Track List- 1. Conceivable Evidence 2. Prevail 3. Let The Good Times Roll 4. When I Grow Up 5. Brainfish Oner 6. Wind It Up 7. Black Santa 8. L.I.F.E. 9. Rock Der Planet 10. XFL 11. Man 2 Ape 12. Drain On Brugs 13. Pot Of Gold 14. Mos Eisley 15. Welcome To America 2012 16. Wake Up Daed 17. Girls Dipped In Chocolate 18. Bus Stop Girl 19. Reincarnate 20. Strange Birds 21. L.A. 2 San Jose 22. Who's Got Presents
****** SELECT FROM THE DROP DOWN MENU!! ******
** Shape Shifters - Soul Lows - Collector's Edition - "Blue" **
[ONLY ONE LEFT!!!] SOLD OUT!! Price: $11.50 (Super Dope Deal!!!) -DON'T SLEEP THEY ALWAYS GO FAST & MIGHT GO OOP SOON AS 'SOUL-LOWS 3' WILL BE OUT LATER THIS YEAR!!! Super dope CD of tracks pulled from different albums + many unreleased or vinyl only until now! Features a variety of solo cuts with a few tracks with multiple guests. Lots of rarities on this joint! Includes cuts from Awol one, Circus, Existereo, Die, Akuma, 2Mex, Life Rexall, Doc Lewd, Subtitle, Met fly & even has a track featuring all three of the Chainsmokers! The "BLUE" Track List- 1. L.I.F.E.- Life Rexall 2. Welcom To America 2012- Die 3. Audible Sensations- Existereo 4. Motor Mouth- Awol One 5. Sea Of Emotions- Exist, Circus, Life 6. Akuma- Akuma 7. Hard Work- Doc Lewd 8. Do They Even Know- Exist, Life Rexall 9. I Found You- Die The Hunter 10. Nine Times Out Of Ten- Life Rexall 11. Midnight Symphony- Exist, Met fly, Doc Lewd 12. Chew Glass Spit Mosaic- Doc Lewd, Met Fly, Die, Akuma, Subtitle 13. When I Grow Up- 2Mex 14. Fear The Outcome- Existereo 15. XFL- Die, Akuma, Life Rexall 16. Bus Stop Girl- Subtitle 17. Switch It Up- Die, Akuma, Existereo
****** SELECT FROM THE DROP DOWN MENU!! ******
Shape Shifters - 'Soul-Lows 2'
*Official Shifters released CDr*
*** BACK IN STOCK!!! *** ONLY A FEW LEFT!! Price: $11.50 (Super Dope Deal!!!) The latest selection of the Shifters solo cuts! Underground hip hop at it finest! Featuring all the Shifters rocking solo tracks. All the same homies as the first, but this one has Radioinactive also! Includes a mega bangin' posse cut, produced by Deeskee to top off the album!!! Track List- 1. How Vein Are You 2. Press Kit 3. John Godly 4. The X is a ***** (The Cross Is A Knife) 5. Graffiti Brydge 6. Decay 7. Rubadubop 8. Hot n' Horny 9. Keep Stompin' 10. She Likes Guns 11. All Of Me 12. Wind It Up
****** SELECT FROM THE DROP DOWN MENU!! ****** Circus & Friends - 'Gangstahz Fo Gawd' Price: $14.50 Dope CD!!! Classic Circus, back in action! Plenty of aliens, government conspiracies, ancient egyptian pyramids & cave-bots! Lots of rare & unreleased stuff on this one!!! This one won't be around for ever! Could disappear again! DON'T SLEEP ON THIS MISSING SHAPE SHIFTERS ALBUM!!!...*(RECORDED BETWEEN PLANET OF THE SHAPES & KNOW FUTURE/ADOPTED BY ALIENS)* ** Features some sick fuckin' cover art on the outer sleeve, inner fold out back cover & BLACK SANTA & BLING JESUS ON THE DISC!! Worth it just for Circus' CRAZY artwork!! Track List- 1. PLANET G SPOT 2. ACCESS THE LIGHT BODY 3. JASON VOORHEES 4. DRAIN ON BRUGS 5. $CRIBBLE DOWN THE AMOUNT 6. SHEEPLE 7. CAPTAIN SMARTY PANTZ ____________________________ -GANGSTERZ 4 GOD- {8. NAZI-NIN-JAH RASTAFARI {9. BLACK SANTA {10. IS GOD A MARTIAN?! {11. 5 PANGAEAS-5 RACES {12. PRAY 4 SURF {13. FUN WIT VATOS ____________________ 14. FRUITOPIAN CONDITIONS 15. 7 DEMENTIONS 16. ALABAMA X 17. SMASH HIT SINGLE OF THE MILENIUM 18. GO HOME!! . . . CHECK OUT -> All my other CD's & Vinyl on my Discogs page or send me a message on eBay

name: The Shape Shifters-'Adopted By Aliens' 2LP or 'Terrorist From Another World' DVD
description:
**** LAST COPY IN-STOCK!!!!!! ****

AFTER THIS COPY ITS -

SOLD OUT!

Classic Shape Shifters album first released as a CD on Celestial, now a limited vinyl release in 2006 from 24-7 & Subversiv* Records. Only 1000 copies made & only a few left!!! Features classic Rob One (R.I.P.) cuts & a Megamix, 2Mex, Mikah 9, Don't sleep!!! ** ALREADY SOLD OUT EVERYWHERE ELSE FOR YEARS!! ** ## WHO KNOW'S IF I'LL GET ANY MORE??!!! ## Track List- A1. Who's Got Presents A2. Prevail A3. Hootie & The Brainfish B1. Reiterate B2. Rob One Mixtape Megamix B3. Words Of Wizdumb B4. Mos Eisley C1. Strange Birds C2. Flossin' C3. Chain Name C4. Planet Rock D1. Triple Threat D2. Beetleborg D3. Wake Up Dead D4. Korn Bizkit ______________________________________________________________ ****** SELECT FROM THE DROP DOWN MENU!! ****** Shape Shifters - DVDr 'Terrorist From Another World' Price: $17.50 (Hand made by the Shape Shifters & sold out of their trunk! They were cool enough to send me a few for everyone that cant get to their shows!!) Super fresh DVD packed full of almost 2 hours of classic Shape Shifters LIVE SHOWS, Videos, Crazy & funny road antics & weird ass Hip Hop Caveman vs. Alien cartoons!!! Featuring Awol One, Circus, Die, Radioinactive, Transducer, Life Rexall, 2Mex & Xololanxinxo (from group - Of Mexican Descent), Subtilte, Andre Asmar & more!!

name: 2Mex & Awol One-'Flow & Tell' / 2Mex-'Live In Bozman, MT' or OMD-'Live At The Knitting Factory' CDr
description: * SELECT FROM THE DROP DOWN MENU! * OMD- 'Live At The Knitting Factory' *Limited Edition CDr* Price: $12.99 HOLY CRAP! THIS IS THE SHOW TO END ALL SHOWS!!! Of Mexican Descent LIVE! - featuring MC's- Brother J of X-clan, Awol One, Busdriver, Existereo, Life Rexall, LMNO, Darkleaf, Dannu, Zen & Mark Luv. With a bunch of dope producers providing the beats. This was a night to go down in the history of hip hop! The best of LA & Cali hip hop under one roof busting the straight dope, LIVE!!! DON'T SLEEP!!! THESE WON'T BE AROUND FOREVER!!! _____________________________________________________________ * SELECT FROM THE DROP DOWN MENU! * ** 2Mex - Live In Bozman Montana ** *Limited Eedition CDr* Price: $12.99 2Mex live at one of the stops on the 'Who's Your Daddy Tour'. Excellent sound & very limited! Only 150 copies made! Only a couple left!!! THESE ARE THE LAST & THERE WILL BE NO MORE!!!-Don't sleep!!!!!! No Tracklist - Just One or two long tracks with about an hour of dope music! ____________________________________________________________________ * SELECT FROM THE DROP DOWN MENU! * ONLY 2 COPIES LEFT!!! Out of only a few hundred released!! ** 2Mex & Awol One - 'Flow & Tell' CDr - Limited album!! ** ** LIVE RECORDINGS FROM THE FLOW & TELL TOUR!!! (March-April 2001) ** Price: $12.99 48 minutes of songs from live shows in Portland, Oregon - Seattle, Washington & Sacramento, California!!! If you were at any of these shows (Like I was) you know these are MEGA DOPE!!!
